ygData.subject: Re: is this true?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never heard anything about sharing exp with a pet, but I have noticed a slower advancement with my mage and my necro than with my other characters, but
ygData.messageBody:
I've never heard anything about sharing exp with
a pet, but I have noticed a slower advancement with
my mage and my necro than with my other characters,
but that could be due to their races (Iksar and
Gnome, two fairly slow advancers anyway). I will try an
experiment, killing 10 mobs of the same level without pet,
and then 10 with pet and see if difference in
experience gained is there, I will report back with
it.<br><br>Kroq Coldscale<br>Brood of Kotiz<br><br>Gnorm
Gnukemeister<br>Gnomey Mage Extrordinaire
